nodes.text: Watch out for the Wookiee! is an illustrated children's storybook that came with the Millennium Falcon playset of the Jedi Force toy series released by Playskool.

The story centers on Han Solo and Chewbacca trying to escape Imperial troops on Tatooine. The two try and take shelter on a nearby green planet, where they are ambushed by another group of Imperials. However, an army of Wookiees who lived on that planet comes out of the wood to save them.
